authentication
Class AbstractAuthenticator

java.lang.Object
  authentication.AbstractAuthenticator
Direct Known Subclasses:
Authenticator
public abstract class AbstractAuthenticator
extends java.lang.Object

Generic base class for the session authentication webservice This is an abstract class with the generic code for the session authentication web service. To integrate authentication for a user account system, this class should be inherited. The abstract methods should be implemented with the business logic applicable to the user account system.

abstract  Credential[] getEmptyCredentials()
          Get an empty array of credential fields This function should be implemented to return an array of empty credential fields applicable for the user account system used.

getEmptyCredentials

public abstract Credential[] getEmptyCredentials()
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
Get an empty array of credential fields This function should be implemented to return an array of empty credential fields applicable for the user account system used.

Array of credential objects defining the credentials needed for authentication.

authenticate

public boolean authenticate(java.lang.String session_id,
                            Credential[] credentials)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
Authenticate session using with given credentials Authenticate an already open session with set of credential provided by the client.

Parameters:
session_id - ID of the session to authenticate.
credentials - Client supplied credentials.
Returns:
Whether session could be authenticated.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

checkCredentials

protected abstract boolean checkCredentials(java.lang.String session_id,
                                            Credential[] credentials)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
Check the credentials used for client authentication This method should be implemented to check the credentials used for client authentication. This is the integration point for custom user account systems. It is also one of the places to perform integration between the user account system and the mote reservation system.

Parameters:
session_id - ID of the session object; for use with custom session attributes
credentials - The credentials supplied by the client
Returns:
authentication success or failure.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
